item.title: #en @ 1536380109678120960
item.description: @BrunaLab @DanielBolnick @Biotropica Strong agree. "Open data" should not mean "you have to give it away to anyone who can analyze it faster, right away, no matter how much sweat and tears and $ you put into it". That's a recipe for big extractive labs that parasitize field work.

My point was about the need for open data sharing. 2/5 https://t.co/j9pVbHBylw

item.title: #en @ 1536005658520481792
item.description:
I have a weird ability to archive data sources in my head.
I don't archive data in my head; it would simply create a black hole that will destroy the world.
What I mean is I remember where to find data once I have found it in the past. I remember important sites for open data.

item.description: One of the biggest challenges to fighting climate change is a lack of data. @BloombergDotOrg is working w/ @EmmanuelMacron, @OnePlanetSummit, the @UN, @OECD, IMF, FSB & GFANZ to create an #opendata platform to standardize corporate climate data. https://t.co/JWCbhQKATM
